laboratory_examinations.findings: Undevelopment of insufficient growth of the iris sphincter and dilator muscles.
Normal size, shape, and echotexture of both kidneys.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the brain
laboratory_examinations.findings: Periventricular white matter hyperintensities in T2 image and tortuous cortical veins.
Dilatation of internal carotid arteries, stretches of proximal cerebral arteries, and peripheral diffuse stenosis of peripheral arteries.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Genetic mutation analysis of the ACTA2 gene
laboratory_examinations.findings: Identified the c.535C>T, p.(Arg179Cys)(NM_001613.4), heterozygous mutation.
